1374950.name: A Creature's Journey
1374950.description:
A Creature’s Journey is a story-rich tactical RPG featuring a hex grid battle system. Explore a vast map of foreign lands brimming with exotic creatures to discover, battle, and befriend. Plan your route over this uncharted world while heeding the biological adaptations of each team member. When dangers prove too perilous, will you retreat or push the boundaries of your journey and venture forward?

A Creature's Journey is an independently-created video game by a small group of passionate creatives.
1374950.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
